scripts.install: concurrently "cd ff-log && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-data-api && npm install --no-optional " "cd excel-connect && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-core && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-model-api && npm install --no-optional" "cd formulajs-connect && npm install --no-optional" "cd demo-apps && npm install --no-optional --allow-root" "cd git-connect && npm install --no-optional" "cd ff-math && npm install --no-optional" "cd model-tests && npm install --no-optional" "cd proxy && npm install --no-optional"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd excel-connect && npm test" "cd lme-core && npm test" "cd model-tests && npm test" "cd lme-model-api && npm test" "cd ff-log && npm test"
